ProdDesc: Our AI-powered Hospital ERP automates hospitals from 10 to 2000 beds, offering centralized database management for hospital groups.

Features.FeatureDesc: Streamline operations and reduce administrative tasks.
Seamlessly connect with financial ERPs like Navision, SAP, Tally, and Oracle.
Improve patient care with Miracle Mobility Solutions.
Efficiently manage stocks and prevent pilferage.

ProdExtro: Upgrade your hospital today with Miracle On Cloud HIS.

ProdName: MoC HIS by Akhil Systems: Healthcare Excellence Simplified

Features.FeatureDesc: Developed by Akhil Systems, a 27-year healthcare IT specialist, MoC HIS guarantees high performance and productivity.
Easily computerize your facility within hours to days with our standard workflow.
Our award-winning solution simplifies processes, policies, and workflows for better decision-making.
MoC HIS meets NABH, NABL, JCI, HIPAA standards, with ISO/IEC 27001:2013 certification.
Suitable for basic computer users, with an intuitive interface.
Seamlessly connect with lab machines, biometric devices, ERPs, and more.
Empower your team with mobile apps, patient portals, and appointment tools.

ProdExtro: Unlock healthcare excellence with MoC HIS today.
